title: Affordable Housing tenements to be constructed to the extent of 20% of basic FSI only and shall not be required on additional FSI / TDR wherever permissible as per UDCPR
clause_text: Affordable Housing tenements to be constructed to the extent of 20% of basic FSI only and shall not be required on additional FSI / TDR wherever permissible as per UDCPR. Amalgamation of affordable plots / affordable tenements shall not be allowed.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Affordable Housing tenements to be constructed to the extent of 20% of basic FSI only and shall not be required on additional FSI / TDR wherever permissible as per UDCPR.
